Now you are pregnant
The main types of maternity 
care in Northern Ireland are:
a)	Midwife-led	
b)	Consultant-led (In this 
case the consultant is a doctor 
known as an obstetrician, and 
the units are called obstetric 
units).
 
c)	Continuity	of	Midwifery	
Carer 
Your options are described in
more detail below:
a)	Midwife-led	care
This includes birth at home or 
in a midwife-led unit.
